name: Lars' Vaporator
Lore: 'Essential for life on desert planets. Condenses water vapor from atmosphere. Has purification filters and coolant tanks. Protects against drought and harsh conditions.',
Text: 'Deploy on a farm. Characters at same site are immune to Sandwhirl. Whenever you are about to activate Force from Beru Stew or Blue Milk, you may first take into hand from Reserve Deck Biggs, Camie, Crell, Fixer, Moisture Farmer, a Lars, or a [Special Edition] Tatooine site.',
